scripts.build:engine: powershell -Command "Remove-Item dist-java-engine -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; cd java-engine; mvn clean package; cd ..; New-Item -ItemType Directory dist-java-engine | Out-Null; Copy-Item java-engine\target\java-engine-1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar dist-java-engine\engine.jar -Force"
scripts.build:engine-linux: cd java-engine && mvn clean package && cd .. && mkdir -p dist-java-engine && cp java-engine/target/java-engine-1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar dist-java-engine/engine.jar
